result.execSummary:
The defendant Roger V. Vincent III was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • False Imprisonment [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.30.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Credit for 4 days served if revoked.
Concurrent to 14CF802

miscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  
*  Pay supervision fees.  
Do not possess or consume alcoholic beverages and do not have alcoholic beverages within the residence.  Do not possess or consume controlled substances, except by prescription.  Participate in counseling deemed appropriate by your agent, which may include: alcohol/drug, anger management/DV counseling, psychiatric/psychological, AODA Assessment and follow-through with recommended treatment.  Finish Circle of Change Program.    Actively search for employment, be employed or attend an educational institution or vocational training program.  
*  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.    
*  Submit to a DNA sample (Unless previously provided) and pay surcharge.   
*  If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.  
May not have contact with Jodi Savaglio or her residence, no contact by 3rd party, in writing or texting, only through legal representation as needed for housing issue, unless otherwise permitted by the court/agent.  May not possess any weapons, including firearms.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Roger V. Vincent III

records.addlTxt: Deceased
Deceased on 12-7-14
AMENDED to show bond was applied from 14CF765
From linked case #14CF765.  ds/cp
Ct. 1
Cts 2 & 3
Conditions of Probation Imposed by the Judge

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney F Parise.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Victim present.  Letter from victim read into the record.  Court withholds sentence and places deft on probation for 18 months w/conditions concurrent to 14CF802; deft to submit DNA sample and pay $250 DNA surcharge; bond from file 14CF765 applied to costs in this file; credit for 4 days served if revoked.
No contact order while in custody signed by deft.
No Contact Order While in Custody sent to KCJ for deft's signature.

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney F Parise.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  On State's motion, cts 2 and 3 are dismissed and read in.  Deft pleads no contest.  Court finds deft guilty.  PSI ordered.   State's motion requesting no contact while in custody.  Court orders deft to have no contact w/victim while in custody.  SEH 12/4/14 at 1:30pm.  Bond continued.
requesting no contact while in custody filed by ADA Phan

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney F Parise.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Parise states the State provided him an offer and he gave back a counter offer; believes case is resolvable; states the deft is in the living free program now and wants to complete the program.  STC continued to 10/21/14 at 8:15am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney F Parise.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  For reasons set forth on the record, the JS of 9/8/14 at 9am is changed to a STC.  Bond continued.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney F Parise.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Case is not resolved.  DA PTC 5/30/14 at 1:30pm and JS 9/8/14 at 9am.  Bond continued.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney F Parise.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Parise acknowledges receipt and waives reading.  Deft enters not guilty pleas.  DA PTC 5/16/14 at 1:30pm and FPT 5/27/14 at 8:15am.  Bond continued.
Amended
No violent contact with Jodi S. No discussion of this case with Jodi S.

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State. Def. appeared in court with Atty. Frank Parise. Clerk LE.  Prelim. waived, probable cause found. Bound over to Br. 6 for arraignment on 5-5-14 @ 8:15am. Information filed. Atty. Parise has filed a bond motion and argues for modification of bond conditions. No contact with Jodi S. amended to no violent contact with Jodi S. and no discussion of this case with Jodi S.
to Preliminary Hearing
to Lift No-Contact Order filed by Atty. Parise

119 p.m.  Attorney Tracey Braun appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney F Parise.  Clk  LE.  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 20 days; set before Comm Mason on 4/25/14 @ 830 a.m.  $2500 Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).
